name: Iron Covenant
description: Values heavy armor and siege warfare. The Iron Covenant embodies discipline, defense, and industrial might through fortifications and defensive capabilities.

name: Verdant Reach
description: Emphasizes mobility and PvE advantages. The Verdant Reach represents harmony with nature and magical prowess, offering agility and environmental advantages.

name: Abyssal Remnant
description: Thrives on risky power and self-damaging magic. The Abyssal Remnant pursues power through sacrifice and void manipulation with high-risk, high-reward abilities.
